import numpy as np

X = np.array([
    [0,1,-2,-1],
    [1,3,1,4],
    [3,-1,-1,2],
    [2,0,2,1],
    [4,-3,0,-3]
]    
)

y = np.array([
    [False],
    [True],
    [False],
    [True],
    [False]
]    
)

print ('X:',X.shape)
print ('y:',y.shape)
